Player History
Drafted in 34th round, 531st overall pick, by San Francisco in 2015...
Injured on 8/19/2016 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 4/1/2017...
Injured on 6/8/2017 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/4/2017 with a Ruptured Disc Back, out for full season...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2017, going 17-5, 3.51 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/2018, going 6-0, 3.12...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/2018, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/14/2018 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 4/21/2019 with a Spasms Back, out for 7 weeks...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $912,857 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 7/19/2020 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 7-8 weeks...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $912,857 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/12/2021 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 8/27/2021 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 6 weeks...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $912,857 through salary arbitration...
Traded from San Francisco to Colorado on 2/1/2022 (Going to SF: P Jason Billie, P Cliff Jackson. Going to COL: P Alberto Rodriguez, LF Alonzo Alonso, P Edward Lawhon, P Christian McLin, 1B John
Miller)...
Injured on 6/25/2022 with a Tight Elbow, out for one week...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $912,857 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2023, winning 2 games with a 0.64 ERA...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/6/2024 to a 2-year deal worth $900,000 per year...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/6/2024, off Samuel Dupre (SEA)...
Won World Series with Boston in 2024...
Injured on 7/25/2025 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
